actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Makes three tentacle attacks; each can be replaced with one Fling.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: If target is Large or smaller and grappled, it is swallowed and the grapple ends. Swallowed target is blinded/restrained with total cover and takes 42 (12d6) acid at start of kraken's turns; regurgitates on DC 25 CON fail after taking 50+ damage in a turn, or on death (exits prone).

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: Target grappled (escape DC 18) and restrained; kraken has ten tentacles, each can grapple one target.

actions.name: Fling
actions.description: Throws a held object or grappled creature up to 60 ft. in a random direction and knocks it prone. If it hits a surface: 1d6 bludgeoning per 10 ft.; if thrown at a creature, that creature makes DC 18 DEX save or takes the same damage and is knocked prone.

actions.name: Lightning Storm
actions.description: Creates three lightning bolts at targets within 120 ft.; each target makes DC 23 DEX save, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on failure, half on success.

legendaryActions.name: Lightning Storm
legendaryActions.description: Creates lightning bolts at targets within 120 ft.

legendaryActions.name: Ink Cloud
legendaryActions.description: Creates a heavily obscuring ink cloud; creatures ending turn there take poison damage.
